"Eraser Report II":
"Straight to the point, I have a request.
It's urgent that you eliminate Tiraruda.
Those damn D-arkers are also loitering about
the new planet like they own the place.
You have to exterminate every single one of the
garbage invading the water planet.
Don't think about it, just kill them.
They have no need of a tomorrow.

*Hostiles of Lv.50 or higher"

"単刀直入に依頼する。
ティラルーダを早急に排除しろ。
ダーカーどもは新しい惑星を
我が物顔で徘徊している。
水惑星を荒らすゴミどもは
残さず駆逐しなければならない。
考える前に殺れ。やつらに明日はいらない。

※Lv.50～のエネミーが対象"
